Improper heading structure: multiple <div class="heading"> elements used instead of <h1>, <h2>, etc.
Inaccessible link text: "click here" used multiple times without context.
Missing form labels for input fields: Name, Email, and Country inputs are not associated with <label> elements.
Non-semantic <div> elements used for headings instead of <h1>, <h2>, etc.
Missing `lang` attribute in <html> tag to specify the language of the document.
Table with id "enrollment" missing <th> elements for headers.
Visual-only cues: "required fields are in blue" without any visual indication for colorblind users.
Non-keyboard focusable elements: <div> elements used for buttons without proper role or tabindex.
Missing ARIA roles on landmark regions such as <div id="content"> and <div id="main">.
Inaccessible CAPTCHA without proper instructions or alternatives for users with disabilities.
